short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for QuickSight tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open-source Chrome extension designed to enhance your Amazon QuickSight experience. This tool simplifies workflow with improved calculated field management, dependency graphs, and change history tracking.
